definitions.example: There was a strange quiet in the normally very lively plaza.

definitions.definition: The absence of movement; stillness, tranquility
To become quiet, silent, still, tranquil, calm.
definitions.example: When you quiet, we can start talking.

definitions.definition: To cause someone to become quiet.
definitions.example: Can you quiet your child? He's making lots of noise.

definitions.definition: With little or no sound; free of disturbing noise.
definitions.example: I can't hear the music; it is too quiet.

definitions.definition: Having little motion or activity; calm.

definitions.example: Business was quiet for the season.

definitions.definition: Not talking much or not talking loudly; reserved.
definitions.example: He's a very quiet man usually, but is very chatty after a few beers.
